body:
Well, I am an OCN'er, played on Orphan Soup in the last one of these, most notably was on LunGGlove for a couple OCN tournaments, now am on Zasjeda. 

Anyway, AMA?

replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus, I hope you enjoy it :D

What is your favourite word to use?
How often do you use this word?
What does the word mean to you?

P.S I don't have an obsession with people and their words, I just like asking random questions XD
